message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a one-time price of $20000. It's a great opportunity to get a fantastic deal!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid I can't meet you at $10000. I'm willing to make a compromise, how about $18000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $12000?
I'm not willing to go as low as $12000, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $16000?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to make one more offer. How about $14000?
